short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline class action filings and reclaim your money effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Class Action Buddy is your ultimate tool for tapping into the world of class action settlements. With the ability to search through hundreds of cases, this extension identifies settlements you're entitled to, revolutionizing the way you file for class actions. Embrace the power of convenience and efficiency, as Class Action Buddy guides you to reclaim what's rightfully yours. Our users are consistently impressed with the substantial returns, averaging $200 per user. Engage in a handful of class actions in less than 5 minutes and be a part of the collective $4 billion in class action settlements from 2022. Join the Friends of Buddy and witness the ease of maximizing your claims today!
